data.title: JUMP DAYS
data.content: The first PNI Jump Days will be held on Feb 19-20 and gives all of PNI an opportunity to “think-outside-the-box” by learning and improving outside of regular production efforts. It demonstrates our commitment to innovation, quality and fun, encompassing one of our core values, “leave it in a better place”. Jump days is scheduled time to quash that bug, automate process and tools, eliminate pain points and put effort into what we want work on.

data.title: Empower Book Club
data.content: This year the Empower Book Club are diving into Brené Brown’s Dare to Lead. Starting in February, the club will meet to discuss Brown’s findings from her discussions and research conducted with leaders, change makers, and culture shifters. Don’t be surprised if you see the learnings being implemented inthe office here!
